attributes.action: Have a real debate on putting no restrictions on people who refuse the vaccine
attributes.additional_details: So people are not restricted by laws implemented to force people to get the vaccine and ensure there are no travel bans, shopping bans and any other type of ban that restrict people from carrying out day-to-day activities
attributes.background: We need this to be discussed so that people are not forced into having a vaccine if they want to rely on the scientifically backed Hurd immunity
